item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Winx Club S1 E12 'Miss Magix' Italian Audio [Not TV rip]
item.description:
Good afternoon, I am looking for Episode 12 of the 1st Season of the Winx Club, 'Miss Magix' in its original Italian. For some reason, none of the official Winx Club YouTube channels have it. And the only version of the episode in its original Italian available to me in US is an old TV rip uploaded to Dailymotion.

I know the RAI website and Amazon Prime Italy have it but you need an Italian VPN/proxy/IP address to access them.

So, could somebody with an Italian IP address/proxy/VPN/whatever please rip the episode in its original Italian because I am planning on making English subs for the first four seasons and first movie of the Winx Club and it honestly peeves me to see that particular episode becoming hard to find nowadays.
item.author: Astolfcool2001
